posts.post_content:
I am selling eight different tougher T205's individually.  If you would like  scans, please email me (oldorioles@aol.com) and I would be happy to provide them.  All cards are priced at or below VCP.  First come, first served.  Please add $5 for shipping, PayPal f/f is fine. Thanks!

Barger (Partial B) PSA 6MC - $200
Ford (White cap) PSA 5MC - SOLD
Crandall (T Crossed) - PSA 5 - $200
Graham (Cubs) - SGC 70 - $550
Harmon (left ear) - PSA 5.5 - SOLD
Shean (Cubs) - SGC 70 - $500
Scanlan - PSA 5 - SOLD
Turner - SGC 50 - $215
Can you send me a scan of the Scanlan to [url]rats60@aol.com[/url]?

Kyle,

I got your email for scan request but I need to know your email to send them to you.  Thanks, Dave
